title: Does league have a certain algorithm when you're on a winning streak?
body:
Here's how my games go.

I'll win 2-4 in a row. I'll STOMP and poo on everyone. Straight up 4 games in a row. Check my match history.

THEN.I'll get this team where they all have SEVERE down syndrome. Not even lying. I actually think the people behind the keyboard's might genuinely have down-syndrome. I end up winning lane and doing good. My whole team feeds TERRIBLY. We lose. I lose like over half the lp i won from the winning streak. I win like 8lp per game. Lose like 25. 

So i basically get nowhere.

What's the algorithm?
